Package teapot.builder.utils

Class RequirementHandler

java.lang.Object
teapot.builder.utils.RequirementHandler
public final class RequirementHandler extends Object
Utility class for handling requirements and validations of various types of values.

    • requirePositive

      public static <T extends Number> T requirePositive(T value) throws NonPositiveNumberException
      Requires that a numeric value is positive.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the value, must be a subclass of Number.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be validated.
      Returns:
      The validated positive value.
      Throws:
      NonPositiveNumberException - If the value is not positive.

      public static String requireNonEmptyString(String value) throws EmptyStringException
      Requires that a string value is not empty.
      Parameters:
      value - The string value to be validated.
      Returns:
      The validated non-empty string value.
      Throws:
      EmptyStringException - If the value is null or empty.

    • requireGreaterThan

      public static <T extends Number> T requireGreaterThan(T value, T boundary) throws NumberException
      Requires that a numeric value is greater than a specified boundary.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the value, must be a subclass of Number.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be validated.
      boundary - The boundary value to compare against.
      Returns:
      The validated value if greater than the boundary.
      Throws:
      NumberException - If the value is not greater than the boundary.

    • requireLessThan

      public static <T extends Number> T requireLessThan(T value, T boundary) throws NumberException
      Requires that a numeric value is less than a specified boundary.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the value, must be a subclass of Number.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be validated.
      boundary - The boundary value to compare against.
      Returns:
      The validated value if less than the boundary.
      Throws:
      NumberException - If the value is not less than the boundary.

    • requireParsable

      public static void requireParsable(String arg, String requiredTypeName) throws IllegalArgumentException, DateTimeException
      Requires that a string argument is parseable as a specified type.
      Parameters:
      arg - The string argument to be parsed.
      requiredTypeName - The name of the required type (e.g., "Integer", "Long", "Float", "Double", "ZonedDateTime", "String").
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the argument cannot be parsed as the specified type.
      DateTimeException - If the argument cannot be parsed as a ZonedDateTime.
